text.section: There is a Drinking Driver Monitor Program Fund.
The Fund shall be used for all costs of the Drinking Driver Monitor Program.

section.section: The Fund is a special, nonlapsing fund that is not subject to § 7-302 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
The Treasurer shall hold the Fund separately, and the Comptroller shall account for the Fund.

text.section:
The Fund consists of:
the program fees paid by supervisees in the Drinking Driver Monitor Program; and
investment earnings of the Fund.
The money of the Fund shall be invested in the same manner as other State money.

Expenditures from the Fund may be made only:
in accordance with the State budget; or
by the budget amendment procedure as provided in § 7-209 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
The Fund is subject to audit by the Office of Legislative Audits under § 2-1220 of the State Government Article.
